verses.verse: And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnath,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And he came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3947>get<s%> her for me to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is there <S%H369>never<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> among the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> or among <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1980>goest<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H4480>Philistines?<s%> <S%H6430><s%> And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3947>Get<s%> her for me; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> pleaseth me <S%H3474>well.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

But his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was of the <S%H4480>LORD,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> an <S%H8385>occasion<s%> against the <S%H4480>Philistines:<s%> <S%H6430><s%> for at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then went Samson <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H8123><s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnath,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H8553>Timnath:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roared<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he <S%H8156>rent<s%> him as he would have <S%H8156>rent<s%> a <S%H1423>kid,<s%> and he had <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H369><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but he <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he had <S%H6213>done.<s%>
And he went <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she pleased Samson <S%H3474>well.<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H8123><s%>

And after a <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H3117><s%> he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4658>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H5712>swarm<s%> of <S%H1682>bees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> in the <S%H1472>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion.<s%>

And he <S%H7287>took<s%> thereof <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and went <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H398>eating,<s%> and <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, and they did <S%H398>eat:<s%> but he <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> them <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H7287>taken<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H4480>carcass<s%> <S%H1472><s%> of the <S%H738>lion.<s%>

So his <S%H1>father<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H802>woman:<s%> and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4960>feast;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> used the young <S%H970>men<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, that they <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H4828>companions<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I will <S%H4994>now<s%> put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> unto you: <S%H518>if<s%> ye can certainly <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H5046><s%> it me within the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and find it <S%H4672>out,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of garments: <S%H899><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> it me, then shall <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of <S%H899>garments.<s%> And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Put <S%H2330>forth<s%> thy <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Out of the <S%H4480>eater<s%> <S%H398><s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3978>meat,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>strong<s%> <S%H5794><s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4966>sweetness.<s%> And they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5046>expound<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H6601>Entice<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H376>husband,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto <S%H853>us<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> we <S%H8313>burn<s%> thee and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> have ye <S%H7121>called<s%> us to take that we <S%H3423>have?<s%> is it <S%H3808>not<s%> so?

And <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou dost <S%H7535>but<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and <S%H157>lovest<s%> me <S%H3808>not:<s%> thou hast put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> it me. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> it my <S%H1>father<s%> nor my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and shall I <S%H5046>tell<s%> it thee?

And she <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H834>while<s%> their <S%H4960>feast<s%> <S%H1961>lasted:<s%> and it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H5046>told<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> she lay <S%H6693>sore<s%> upon him: and she <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of her <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H2775>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> than <S%H4480>honey?<s%> <S%H1706><s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H5794>stronger<s%> than a <S%H4480>lion?<s%> <S%H738><s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3884>If<s%> ye had not <S%H2790>plowed<s%> with my <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> ye had <S%H3808>not<s%> found <S%H4672>out<s%> my <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2488>spoil,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> change of <S%H2487>garments<s%> unto them which <S%H5046>expounded<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%> And his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> given to his <S%H4828>companion,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had used as his <S%H7462>friend.<s%>
